titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to Maister Iuelles chalenge, by Doctor Harding
titleStmt.author: Harding, Thomas, 1516-1572.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Bogard at the Golden Bible, with priuilege,

notesStmt.note: A reply to part 2 of: Jewel, John. The true copies of the letters betwene the reverend father in God John Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: *⁴ A-3D⁴.
Running title reads: An ansvvere to M. Iuelles chalenge.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
